item.description:
China needs to do more to boost employment and stabilise its property market, top officials acknowledged on Saturday. Youth unemployment hit an unprecedented 21.3% in mid-2023, while home prices have in turn fallen for months.https://t.co/R7hKwjGERS

Indonesia's transport ministry said it would open a probe into local airline Batik Air after two pilots fell asleep during a flight. A pilot and co-pilot were simultaneously asleep for 28 mins during a flight from South East Sulawesi to Jakarta on Jan 25.https://t.co/3QvLkSVWtq
